key:
(C) 
Sol. 
Volumetric flow rate of the liquid is measured by rotameter.
question_text:
Question 24 
 
Which one of the following quantities of a flowing fluid is measured using a rotameter?
[Fluid Mechanics, 1 Mark]
 
 
(A) Static pressure 
 
(B) Dynamic pressure 
 
(C) Volumetric flow rate 
 
(D) Viscosity
answer_text:
(C) 
Sol. 
Volumetric flow rate of the liquid is measured by rotameter.
